name: CookingChords
description: A VR rhythm game that features slicing, shooting, whacking and mixing mechanics in addition to a functional level editor with runtime .wav audio import. Built with Unreal Engine 5 and C++.

name: Luna-Aura
description: A Cinema system client-server project built with Java, developed as part of a Software Engineering course alongside 5 other team members

name: Portfolio
description: This page is a project in and of itself, essentially a Next.js app, and a functional CI/CD pipeline that deploys the website, and all projects with live demos (individually)

name: Investment Calculator
description: An app that calculates compounding interest for investments, built to practice useState.

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: A simple Tic-Tac-Toe game to practice useState. (This project is a Code-Along)

name: EchoShock
description: My current main project, an Indie Game curation platform that is in continued development
